CustomField.description: None = Fixed # Trans. Keep One Open = After 1 Trans completes, generate the 'next' one on the same frequency. Auto-renew = After all Trans are complete, generate the full Count again, such as 12 original, now 12 new future Trans.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: None = Fixed # Trans. Keep One Open = After 1 Trans completes, generate the 'next' one on the same frequency. Auto-renew = After all Trans are complete, generate the full Count again, such as 12 original, now 12 new future Trans.
CustomField.label: Recurrence Method
